TopicTitle: Plane always want to skyrocket upwards when reaching 150 m/s

Articles.Content:
I cant use control surfaces to push down on the craft, some wierd force is too great. Ive even emptied out all fuel tanks and used fuel cheat and still same problem. I think its a weight problem but according to the center of mass and lift this thing should fly.

http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q561/chadro_6963/Kerbal/screenshot5.png

Edited January 3, 2015 by lextacy
It's off-centre thrust. Raise the engines a bit.

*Nods sagely*

Having the bulk of the aircraft above the center of thrust means that as drag increases, a torque moment is produced that wants to pitch your nose up.

Longitudinal, static, and dynamic balance are all important, but don't forget to balance the drag a well.

Best,

-Slashy
